meal_suggestions.name: Oatmeal with Berries and Protein Powder

notes: Eat 302g protein daily to support your gain_muscle goal
Spread protein intake across all meals
Stay hydrated with at least 8 glasses of water daily
Adjust portions based on hunger and energy levels
